info.title: siasn-jf
info.description: The SIASN manajemen JF backend provides API for the Manajemen JF dashboard.

get.summary: Get the Statistics of Activity Request Statuses
get.description: This endpoint will return an array of statistics representing each status possible for an activity request an the number of request is in that status currently.

post.summary: Submit Activity/Event Admission

activity_id.description: A UUID generated for the activity that has been submitted.

400.description:
Bad Request

Not all possible errors are displayed here.

value.message: some ASNs cannot be found by the given NIP
attendees NIP(s) are needed, either with old or new version NIP

post.description:
Submits a new activity/event admission. A single admission must contains the complete activity data, including the NIPs of the attendees and filenames given from uploading temporary support documents.

Submitting the admission will move support document files from temporary to permanent location. Only those files that have their filenames specified in `temp_dokumen_pendukung` are moved from temporary location. The filenames must match the names given to each file before uploading the files one by one. Endpoints such as this that require you to upload multiple files of the same kind require you to submit the filenames again. That's because you may not want all files to be saved to permanent locations, for example due to the user deleting some files that he/she just uploaded. Only the exact filenames that you supply are saved to the permanent locations. Temporary locations will be purged regularly.

Attendees can be submitted via their new/old NIPs. It is better not to supply the same person twice using new and old NIP fields, although they technically refer to the same person and may not cause any trouble for now.

jenis.description:
Deprecated activity types:
1: Workshop
2: Bimtek
3: Pelatihan
4: Sertifikasi
5: Akreditasi
6: Uji Kompetensi Naik Jenjang
7: Uji Kompetensi Peripindahan Jabatan
New Activity types:
8: Pelatihan Fungsional
9: Pelatihan Teknis
10: Pelatihan Manajerial
11: Pelatihan Sosio-kultural

tgl_mulai.description: The activity start date, in ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD.

tgl_selesai.description: The activity end date, in ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD.

jabatan_jenjang.description: Position/grade specified. Must exist in the agency.

data_tambahan.description: Optional extra data that may not be used/displayed.

temp_dokumen_pendukung.description: Exact filenames for support documents and it's document name (human readable ones) that were uploaded to the temporary location using the upload endpoint.

peserta_user_id.description: An array of ASN UUIDs that will attend this activity/event.

post.summary: Upload a Single Activity Admission Support Document

url.description: Make a PUT request with the file as request body to upload the file to the signed URL.

filename.description: The filename. Cache this filename for previewing and submitting.

post.description:
You cannot upload an support doc directly to permanent location. It must first be in temporary location and will then be moved to permanent location after you submit the requirement admission. To start uploading this file, create a POST request to this URL and make a PUT request to the given URL.

The given filename is used for submitting and previewing. The filename is the filename that is stored in object storage, so you will need it for previewing and submitting the admission.

For this you also have to submit the MIME type of the file you want to upload. The API will check if the type is allowed and will generate a filename according to the MIME type.

Only these are allowed:
application/pdf => .pdf
application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet => .xlsx
application/vnd.ms-excel => .xls
application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingm => .docx
application/msword => .doc

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the file you want to upload. The generated filename has extension that depends on the MIME type.

get.summary: Preview an Activity Admission Support Document
get.description: The preview endpoints will redirect you with 302 to the signed URL. The preview endpoints like this require a filename which was generated by the upload endpoint.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The filename generated by the upload endpoint when uploading the file.

get.summary: Download an Activity Admission Support Document
get.description: The download endpoints will redirect you with 302 to the signed URL. The download endpoints like this require a filename that was supplied for upload, and was returned by the /detail endpoint.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The filename generated by the upload endpoint when uploading the file.

get.description:
Search ASN based on NIP, treated as new and old NIP.
When there are two matches found, one by new and one for old NIP match, the one that match the new NIP is chosen. This deprecates search endpoints which differentiate new and old NIPs search. May return 404 if the ASN cannot be found.

The searched ASN is searched based on the logged in user work agency ID. So even if the NIP can be found, it may be reported as not found if the ASN work outside the logged in user agency. This means the user can only search for ASNs in the user work agency only.

parameters.name: nip
parameters.description: The ASN new or old NIP.

get.summary: Search ASN Based on New NIP
get.description: Deprecated, use /activity/admission/search-asn instead, as this endpoint now does exactly the same as that endpoint.

parameters.name: nip_baru
parameters.description: The ASN new NIP.

get.summary: Search ASN Based on Old NIP
get.description: Deprecated, use /activity/admission/search-asn instead, as this endpoint now does exactly the same as that endpoint.

parameters.name: nip_lama
parameters.description: The ASN old NIP.

modified_at.description: Modified at timestamp in UNIX epoch seconds.

PAK document is supported only for uji kompetensi perpindahan jabatan

500.description:
Internal Server Error.
5xx errors do not have error cause. They are hidden and can only be seen through the service logs.

value.message: copying (or moving + deleting) files in object storage failed

post.description: Submit certificates and PAK documents. This may return some common errors for example 404 when the activity cannot be found. The submitted certificates/PAKs must have already existed in object storage temporary location. The PAK document is available only if the activity type is uji kompetensi perpindahan jabatan.

peserta_user_id.description: The ASN hexadecimal ID of whom this certificate/PAK is issued for.

jenis.description: 1 for certificate, 2 for PAK. PAK can only be submitted for uji kompetensi perpindahan jabatan.

post.summary: Upload a Single Activity Certificate/PAK

url.description: Make a PUT request with the file as request body to upload the file to the signed URL.

value.message: activity admission status is not certificate request
PAK document is supported only for uji kompetensi perpindahan jabatan

post.description:
Upload a single certificate/PAK document. Will return 400 if the activity status is not certificate request. This endpoint will redirect you with 307 to the object storage upload signed URL.
The redirect must be requested with PUT request and with the file as request body as bytes stream.

parameters.name: kegiatan_id
parameters.description: The activity UUID.

parameters.name: peserta_user_id
parameters.description: The ASN UUID of whom this certificate/PAK is associated with.

parameters.name: jenis
parameters.description: 1 = certificate, 2 = PAK. PAK is only available for uji kompetensi perpindahan jabatan.

get.description: This endpoint will redirect you to the object storage signed URL. If after redirect you get a 404 error, that means the file does not exist. You can also get 404 error before redirect, in which you should treat it as like the file does not exist.

parameters.name: kegiatan_id
parameters.description: The activity UUID.

parameters.name: peserta_user_id
parameters.description: The ASN UUID of whom this certificate/PAK is associated with.

parameters.name: jenis
parameters.description: 1 = certificate, 2 = PAK. PAK is only available for uji kompetensi perpindahan jabatan.

get.description:
This endpoint will redirect you to the object storage signed URL. If after redirect you get a 404 error, that means the file does not exist. You can also get 404 error before redirect, in which you should treat it as like the file does not exist.

PAK type has been removed.

`force` can be set to true to force regenerating the certificate. Otherwise it will only regenerate the certificate once, as long as it is not already found in the object storage. Setting `force` to true will probably make the download starts significantly longer.

parameters.name: kegiatan_id
parameters.description: The activity UUID.

parameters.name: peserta_user_id
parameters.description: The ASN UUID of whom this certificate/PAK is associated with.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: true/false, set to true to force regenerate the document every time

get.summary: Get the Statistics of Requirement Request Statuses
get.description: This endpoint will return an array of statistics representing each status possible for an requirement request an the number of request is in that status currently.

post.summary: Submit Requirement Admission
post.description:
Submits a new requirement admission. A single admission must contains the complete admission data, estimation document filenames given from uploading temporary support documents.

Submitting the admission will move support document files from temporary to permanent location. Only those files that have their filenames specified in `temp_dokumen_perhitungan` are moved from temporary location. The filenames must match the names given to each file before uploading the files one by one. Endpoints such as this that require you to upload multiple files of the same kind require you to submit the filenames again. That's because you may not want all files to be saved to permanent locations, for example due to the user deleting some files that he/she just uploaded. Only the exact filenames that you supply are saved to the permanent locations. Temporary locations will be purged regularly.

Just like `temp_dokumen_perhitungan`, you need to submit the cover letter (surat pengantar) exact filename that was given to you for upload. That's because we cannot directly point out which cover letter file to save, as requirement admission ID has not been generated before you submit a new admission request, even though it is always a PDF file and is one-to-one associated with the requirement admission.

temp_dokumen_perhitungan.description: Exact filenames for estimation documents (dokument perhitungan) and it's document name (human readable ones) that were uploaded to the temporary location using the upload endpoint.

get.description: The download endpoints will redirect you with 302 to the signed URL.

post.summary: Uploads Cover Letter to Temporary Location

url.description: Make a PUT request with the file as request body to upload the file to the signed URL.

filename.description: The filename. Cache this filename for previewing and submitting.

post.description:
You cannot upload a cover letter directly to permanent location. It must first be in temporary location and will then be moved to permanent location after you submit the requirement admission. To start uploading this file, create a POST request to this URL and make a PUT request to the given URL.

The given filename is used for submitting and previewing. The filename is the filename that is stored in object storage, so you will need it for previewing and when submitting the admission.

post.description:
You cannot upload an estimation doc directly to permanent location. It must first be in temporary location and will then be moved to permanent location after you submit the requirement admission. To start uploading this file, create a POST request to this URL and make a PUT request to the given URL.

The given filename is used for submitting and previewing. The filename is the filename that is stored in object storage, so you will need it for previewing and when submitting the admission.

For this you also have to submit the MIME type of the file you want to upload. The API will check if the type is allowed and will generate a filename according to the MIME type.

Only these are allowed:
application/pdf => .pdf
application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet => .xlsx
application/vnd.ms-excel => .xls
application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingm => .docx
application/msword => .doc

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the file you want to upload. The generated filename has extension that depends on the MIME type.

get.description: The preview endpoints will redirect you with 302 to the signed URL. The preview endpoints like this require a filename which was generated by the upload endpoint.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The filename generated by the upload endpoint when uploading the file.

put.description:
Edits an existing requirement admission. A single admission must contain the complete admission data from the existing admission plus the changes.

This endpoint will overwrite the existing admission data except the estimation documents which instead are appended to the existing list of documents. Also if no cover letter is provided then it is assumed there are no changes to the cover letter and therefore the previous cover letter is retained.

get.description: The preview endpoints will redirect you with 302 to the signed URL. The preview endpoints like this require a filename which was generated by the upload endpoint.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The filename generated by the upload endpoint when uploading the file.

The preview endpoints will redirect you with 302 to the signed URL. The preview endpoints like this require a filename of the document

post.description:
Set a requirement status to accepted. Will return 400 if requirement already accepted, or the requirement status is not created or revised. Will also return 404 if the requirement ID cannot be found.

The requirement must already have a signed requirement recommendation letter.

kebutuhan_id.description: The same requirement UUID that has been modified.

value.message: cannot set requirement status to accepted, requirement already processed further

post.description: Set a requirement status to denied. Will return 400 if requirement already accepted, or the requirement status is not created, denied, or revised. Will also return 404 if the requirement ID cannot be found.

post.summary: Upload Recommendation Letter to Temporary Location
post.description:
You cannot upload a recommendation letter directly to permanent location. It must first be in temporary location and will then be moved to permanent location after you submit the requirement verification. To start uploading this file, create a POST request to this URL and make a PUT request to the given URL.

The given filename is used for submitting and previewing. The filename is the filename that is stored in object storage, so you will need it for previewing and when submitting the admission.

get.description: The preview endpoints will redirect you with 302 to the signed URL. The filename is generated from the given kebutuhan_id.

parameters.name: kebutuhan_id
parameters.description: The filename is generated from the given kebutuhan_id.

get.description: The download endpoints will redirect you with 302 to the signed URL, pointing to permanent file location. The filename is generated from the given kebutuhan_id.

parameters.name: kebutuhan_id
parameters.description: The filename is generated from the given kebutuhan_id.

get.description: The download endpoints will redirect you with 302 to the signed URL, pointing to permanent file location. Ensure that it has been generated after bulk-submit.

parameters.name: kebutuhan_id
parameters.description: The filename is generated from the given kebutuhan_id.

parameters.name: no_redirect
parameters.description: Set to true to disable redirect, will return a `url` field with 200 code

get.description: The download endpoints will redirect you with 302 to the signed URL, pointing to permanent file location. Ensure that it has been generated after bulk-submit. Signed file basically has signed-<filename> name internally in the storage, so when downloaded it will have the 'signed' prefix.

parameters.name: kebutuhan_id
parameters.description: The filename is generated from the given kebutuhan_id.

post.summary: Upload Recommendation Letter for Multiple Requirements

kegiatan_id.description: The same activity UUID that has been modified.

post.description:
Submit a recommendation letter for multiple requirement IDs. Date, number, document name, ttd_user_id are required. **Filename is not needed, it will be generated.** This endpoint will effectively generate a new unsigned recommendation letter.

Catatan can be optionally submitted.

post.summary: Sign a Recommendation Letter
post.description: Sign a recommendation letter. (Dummy implementation)

post.summary: Submit Dismissal Request
post.description:
Submits a new dismissal request.

Submitting the admission will move support document files from temporary to permanent location. Only those files that have their filenames specified in `temp_dokumen_pendukung` are moved from temporary location. The filenames must match the names given to each file before uploading the files one by one. Endpoints such as this that require you to upload multiple files of the same kind require you to submit the filenames again. That's because you may not want all files to be saved to permanent locations, for example due to the user deleting some files that he/she just uploaded. Only the exact filenames that you supply are saved to the permanent locations. Temporary locations will be purged regularly.

The given filename is used for submitting and previewing. The filename is the filename that is stored in object storage, so you will need it for previewing and submitting the admission. Only pdf is allowed.

post.summary: Accept a Dismissal Request
post.description: Accept a dismissal request. Dismissal letter must has been uploaded to temporary storage.

get.description:
The download endpoints will redirect you with 302 to the signed URL. The download endpoints like this require a filename that was supplied for upload, and was returned by the /detail endpoint.

Available placeholders for the template:

```go
type DismissalAcceptanceTemplate struct {
	DocumentNumber   string `json:"no_dokumen"`
	DocumentDate     string `json:"tgl_dokumen"`
	DecreeNumber     string `json:"no_sk"`
	DecreeDate       string `json:"tgl_sk"`
	DismissalDate    string `json:"tgl_pemberhentian"`
	DismissalReason  string `json:"alasan_pemberhentian"`
	AsnName          string `json:"nama"`
	AsnNip           string `json:"nip"`
	AsnGrade         string `json:"pangkat"`
	Position         string `json:"jabatan_fungsional"`
	OrganizationUnit string `json:"unor"`
}
```

parameters.name: pemberhentian_id
parameters.description: Dismissal ID

parameters.name: no_redirect
parameters.description: Set to true so it does not redirect your request

post.summary: Deny a Dismissal Request
post.description:
Deny a dismissal request.

Submitting the request will move denial support document files from temporary to permanent location. Only those files that have their filenames specified in `temp_dokumen_pendukung_tidak_diberhentikan` are moved from temporary location. For this endpoint, `temp_dokumen_pendukung_tidak_diberhentikan` can be empty. The filenames must match the names given to each file before uploading the files one by one. Endpoints such as this that require you to upload multiple files of the same kind require you to submit the filenames again. That's because you may not want all files to be saved to permanent locations, for example due to the user deleting some files that he/she just uploaded. Only the exact filenames that you supply are saved to the permanent locations. Temporary locations will be purged regularly.

temp_dokumen_pendukung_tidak_diberhentik.description: Can be left empty or nil.

get.summary: Get the Statistics of Promotion Request Statuses
get.description: This endpoint will return an array of statistics representing each status possible for a promotion request an the number of request is in that status currently.

post.summary: Submit Promotion Request
post.description:
Submits a new promotion request.

Submitting the admission will move support document files from temporary to permanent location. The filenames must match the names given to each file before uploading the files one by one. Endpoints such as this that require you to upload multiple files of the same kind require you to submit the filenames again. That's because you may not want all files to be saved to permanent locations, for example due to the user deleting some files that he/she just uploaded. Only the exact filenames that you supply are saved to the permanent locations. Temporary locations will be purged regularly.

post.summary: Upload a Single Promotion PAK Letter Document

url.description: Make a PUT request with the file as request body to upload the file to the signed URL.

filename.description: The filename. Cache this filename for previewing and submitting.

post.description:
You cannot upload an support doc directly to permanent location. It must first be in temporary location and will then be moved to permanent location after you submit the requirement admission. To start uploading this file, create a POST request to this URL and make a PUT request to the given URL.

The given filename is used for submitting and previewing. The filename is the filename that is stored in object storage, so you will need it for previewing and submitting the admission. Only pdf is allowed.

post.summary: Upload a .docx Template
post.description:
The uploaded file must be a docx file.
Will throw 404 if template cannot be found.

Available {path} values:
activity/certificate.docx => Attendee activity certificate
requirement/recommendation-letter.docx => Requirement recommendation letter
dismissal/acceptance-letter.docx => Dismissal letter

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Template paths

get.description:
Will throw 404 if template cannot be found.

Available {path} values can be seen in the upload endpoint.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Template paths

post.summary: Upload a Single Assessment Team Admission Support Document

url.description: Make a PUT request with the file as request body to upload the file to the signed URL.

filename.description: The filename. Cache this filename for previewing and submitting.

post.description:
You cannot upload an support doc directly to permanent location. It must first be in temporary location and will then be moved to permanent location after you submit the admission. To start uploading this file, create a POST request to this URL and make a PUT request to the given URL.

The given filename is used for submitting and previewing. The filename is the filename that is stored in object storage, so you will need it for previewing and submitting the admission.

For this you also have to submit the MIME type of the file you want to upload. The API will check if the type is allowed and will generate a filename according to the MIME type.

Only these are allowed:
application/pdf => .pdf
application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet => .xlsx
application/vnd.ms-excel => .xls
application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingm => .docx
application/msword => .doc

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the file you want to upload. The generated filename has extension that depends on the MIME type.

2:Disetujui  - Belum Terbit Sertifikat (Aksi : Lihat, Ajukan Sertifikat),
